monitoring_period.title: Monitoring Period
monitoring_period.description: The monitoring period that this dataset belongs to:

uri_ipfs_data_raw.title: Raw Dataset IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_data_raw.description: IPFS URI of the raw (but anonymised) data:

uri_ipfs_report_transfer.title: Transfer Report IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_report_transfer.description: IPFS URI of the report produced by the RMD that performed the transfer (and anonymisation, if applicable) of the raw data from source to IPFS:

uri_ipfs_rmd_transfer.title: Transfer RMD IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_rmd_transfer.description: IPFS URI of the RMD that performed the transfer (and anonymisation, if applicable) of the raw data from source to IPFS:

uri_ipfs_data_final.title: Final Dataset IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_data_final.description: IPFS URI of final version of processed dataset:

uri_ipfs_rmd_cleaning.title: Cleaning RMD IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_rmd_cleaning.description: IPFS URI of the RMD that processed (cleaned, corrected, etc.) the data and produced the final dataset:

uri_ipfs_report_cleaning.title: Cleaning Report IPFS URI
uri_ipfs_report_cleaning.description: IPFS URI of the report produced by the RMD that processed (cleaned, corrected, etc.) the data and produced the final dataset:
